title: Google makes office attendance part of performance reviews
description: Employees need to be in the office at least three days a week.

title: GM’s EVs will get access to Tesla’s Supercharger network in 2024
description: GM EV drivers will need a dongle at first; NACS ports will show up in 2025.

title: UK’s plans for “first global summit” on AI safety draw criticism
description: Announcement does not include "a single voice from civil society or academia," says critic.

title: Today I stumbled upon Microsoft’s 4K rendering of the Windows XP wallpaper
description: Microsoft Design site has a ton of attractive wallpapers, retro and otherwise.

title: Smart TV industry rocked by alleged patent conspiracy from chipmaker
description: Lawsuit: Patent trolls created “harmful illusion” of unstable TV-chip market.

title: Reddit’s new API pricing will kill off Apollo on June 30
description: Faced with 30 days' notice for a $1.6 million monthly bill, Apollo calls it quits.

title: Google un-bans Downloader app, but developer still mad about “broken” DMCA
description: Downloader app for TVs "was offline for 20 days, all because the DMCA is broken."

title: Testing antibacterial surfaces on the International Space Station
description: Humans breathe out a lot of microbes that can make homes on surfaces inside the ISS.

title: Porsche builds itself a 900-volt hypercar as a 75th birthday present
description: It promises record-breaking Nürburgring times and recharging in 10 minutes.

title: Sweet study finds how to keep gummy bears chewable longer
description: Internal (and edible) crosslinks keeps the polymers of a gummy from hardening.

title: DeSantis ad uses fake AI images of Trump hugging and kissing Fauci, experts say
description: Trump/Fauci Images have strange hair, garbled text, and unnatural body parts.

title: California hospital staff call for halt of surgeries over bizarre particles
description: Hospital officials said the equipment is sterile, while staff questions safety.

title: Nvidia’s new monster CPU+GPU chip may power the next gen of AI chatbots
description: It takes a lot of computing power to pretend to be human.

title: This trailer-sized EV charger will be tested at Dallas airport in June
description: This mobile charger can service four EVs at once at up to 80 kW.

title: Damning probes find Instagram is key link connecting pedophile rings
description: Lawmakers, researchers demand Meta do more to stop Instagram pedophile rings.

title: EV market share is growing because the vehicles keep getting better
description: New research finds plenty of reasons for the appeal of EVs
